Using Context Menus

When you right-click an item, such as a project or versioned file, Serena ChangeMan Version Manager displays a pop-up menu of operations commonly performed on the object. A project context menu is shown below.



The operations listed on this menu are also available from the menu bar; however, the right-click method provides a faster way of accessing these same menu items.

Grayed out functions are unavailable for one of the following reasons:

  • They are not applicable to the currently selected item.
  • Your administrator has deactivated them.
